name: Harmonious Foundry
description:
Controls:

Arrows:  Move

Space:  Jump

R: Reset

Boxy was just an ordinary box being sent off to whatever address ordered him. He was tossed around the factory to be shipped, but one fateful day... everything would change. He was thrown off the conveyer belt by one of the machines that went rogue, he was beaten and ruined by the many other machines. He had to take things into his own hand or else he would be destroyed. He had to escape the factory full of robots and pistons all moving in their rhythmic ways. The only problem is that the way out won't be easy and so needs your help to do it!
